name: 5 mm Stone Chips
title: (1/4) 5 mm  River Raiter Stone
description: Fine quality 5 mm River Raiter crushed stone, washed and fresh. Best for plastering, tile bedding and fine concrete.
note: Washed, dust-free and fresh stone from modern crushing machine.

name: 10 mm Stone Chips
title: (1/2 inch) 10 mm River Raiter Stone
description: Washed 10 mm River Raiter stone suitable for RCC slab, roof casting, and light structural work.
note: Fresh stone directly from washing machine line.

name: 15 mm Stone Chips
title: (5/8) 15 mm River Raiter Stone
description: High-quality washed 15 mm Raiter stone for beams, columns, heavy RCC and industrial work.
note: Premium graded stone; washed and fresh.

name: 20 mm Down Stone Chips
title: (3/4 Down) 20 mm River Raiter Stone
description: 20 mm down washed stone ideal for heavy slab, road base, bridge and deep foundation casting.
note: Washed, dust-free, suitable for big projects.

name: 25 mm Stone Chips
title: (3/4) 25 mm River Raiter Stone
description: Coarse washed 25 mm stone for piling, heavy foundations, dams, culverts and large construction.
